Description: 96 800x600 Normal 0 false false false EN-US JA X-NONE Up for auction is a Epiphone "Music Rising" 6-String Electric Guitar Here is a Les Paul Standard Epiphone Limited Edition "Music Rising" Electric Guitar w/ Matching Gig Bag. This is equipped with GROVER Tuning Pegs / Keys. It appears to be in Very Good Condition and shows very minimal signs of use and/or age. There are no signs of damage, misuse or poor storage. We did have this “tested” by a professional musician and he states that this plays very well. He was able to point out one potential “issue” and that deals with the Rhythm Treble Switch. He noticed right away that it does not remain in either the Rhythm position or the Treble position but instead moves back to “center”. There is absolutely no visible damage to the switch and it was suggested that it may very well have been made that way but if not, they are a few dollars to replace. Again, there is absolutely no sign this Guitar has been damaged, dropped, etc. however he thought it was important to point out the “Switch”. This comes with the Original Epiphone documentation (see photo). This is being offered As Is (music stand not included). Please let us know if you have any questions or need additional pictures. Be sure to check out our other listings . . . shipping is always FREE! Thank You & Happy Bidding !!!
Title: Les Paul Standard Epiphone Limited Edition "Music Rising" Electric Guitar w/ Bag
ConditionDescription: this is in Very Good Condition and plays very well; we did have this "tested" by a professional musician and the only potential "issue" is the Rhythm / Treble Switch; this Switch does not stay on Rhythm or Treble but instead always comes back to "center"; our tester was unable to determine of this was by design or if the switch needs to be replaced; beyond that, this is really in Very Good Condition and has a great sound
